bibl.title: The Aiakeion and Tholos of Athens in POxy 2087.
bibl.note: Replies to: Alcibiade N. OIKONOMIDES, The Aiakeion and Its Relation with the Tholos in the Later Agora, AncW 21 (1990) pp. 21-22. - The most plausible inference to draw from P. Oxy. XVII, 2087 (= Pack2 2120), lines 16-18 is that the compiler or his source regarded the Aiakeion and Tholos at Athens as two different places with separate functions.
STROUD Ronald S., The Aiakeion and Tholos of Athens in POxy 2087.
